scripts.dev: concurrently "parcel watch client/index.js --out-file /dist/bundle.js" "parcel watch server/index.js --out-dir dist --target node"  "nodemon dist/index.js"
scripts.build: concurrently "parcel build client/index.js --out-file /dist/bundle.js" "parcel build server/index.js --out-dir dist --target node" && nodemon dist/index.js
